identity.name: Fethmes
principles: Fusion: Industrial Safety Signage x Sci-Fi HUD
Zoom In: Focus on Machine Status
Contrast: Signal vs Noise (Neon on Dark)

typography.installation: Import from Google Fonts: Chivo (400, 700, 900), Manrope (400, 500, 700), JetBrains Mono (400, 700)

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a high-end Industrial MES. Think 'SpaceX Control Room' meets 'Heavy Machinery'. Dark mode is mandatory for Admin/Supervisor. High contrast is mandatory for Worker.
worker_panel_rules: NO small text. Minimum font size 16px.
NO complex navigation. Linear flows only.
Buttons must be HUGE (h-24 or h-32).
Use color to indicate state (Green=Go, Red=Stop).
Confirm destructive actions (Stop Machine) with a hold or modal.
admin_panel_rules: Density is okay here. Use the 'Control Room' grid.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all numerical data and IDs.
Status indicators must be visible at a glance (glowing dots).
Use the 'grid_background' texture on the main dashboard container.
instructions_to_main_agent.charts: Use Recharts. Style them minimally. Remove grid lines if possible, or make them very subtle (opacity 10%). Use the status colors for data series.
instructions_to_main_agent.auth: Login page should use the 'login_bg' image with a heavy dark overlay (bg-black/80) to ensure text readability.

universal_guidelines: Do not use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Chivo'.
Do not use gradients for text. It reduces readability in industrial settings.
Ensure all containers with borders have internal padding (p-4 or p-6).
